page.title: 06LAXDALE EMPLOYMENT
page.content: IN OUR CLASS SURVEY OF PARENTS' EMPLOYMENT, WE FOUND THAT OUT OF 26 PARENTS, 2 WERE WEAVERS,6 WERE SELF-EMPLOYED,11 WERE EMPLOYED BY AN EMPLOYER,6 WERE UNEMPLOYED AND 1 WAS RETIRED. SELF-EMPLOYED WERE: BLACKSMITH,2 PAINTERS,ENGINEER,HAULAGE CONTRACTOR. EMPLOYERS WERE VARIED e.g.WESTERN ISLES COUNCIL, STORNOWAY TRUST, HEALTH BOARD, HYDRO BOARD, CO-OP INSURANCE, CIVIL SERVICE,AND AN OIL RELATED CO. THIS CLASS PATTERN IS INDICATIVE OF THE EMPLOYMENT THROUGHOUT THE DISTRICT AND HAS REMAINED VERY MUCH THE SAME IN RECENT YEARS. THE ONLY INDUSTRIAL WORK IS {TAWSE'S STONE QUARRY.} FARMING IS CONFINED TO CROFT WORK,WITH CROFTS CULTIVATED FOR DOMESTIC USE e.g.potatoes,vegetables AND FOR ANIMAL FEEDING e.g.corn,hay. CATTLE AND SHEEP ARE ALSO GRAZED ON THE CROFTS.
